channel.title: Thinking about selling your company? Some food for thought
channel.description:
I loved this talk from Jason Eckenroth who founded SaaS business Ship Compliant then sold it to a private equity firm.
[The Agony and Ecstasy of Selling my Business.](http://businessofsoftware.org/2017/11/the-agony-and-ecstasy-of-selling-my-business-jason-eckenroth-shipcompliant-bos-europe-2017/)
We're running an AMA with him at the end of this month too if you have any questions, (or horror stories to share).
